page.title: 18Employment - South Wendron
page.content: The largest single employer in South Wendron is the Tourist Attraction of Ha'Penny Park and Poldark Mine, although much of this work is seasonal. Many people in the area are self-employed farmers or smallholders and there are two nurseries, specialising in garden plants. There are some people who work at Cottage Industries, for example: making Cornish Clotted Cream; wood turning; pottery. Two of our parents are monumental masons, working in the local stones, although their workplace is just over the edge of our block. Many people have to travel several miles to work each day in nearby towns and there are a number who are unemployed at the moment.
